Html:
First of all:

Check out the Original Question on StackExchange

It's quite a nightmare finding any decent documentation or tutorials. The samples are already compiled, so there's no way to check the code. So I can only really go based on how VS tries to auto-fill things.


Anyway, I'm able to create a graph, set the axes, and plot a graph on it. However, this graph cannot auto-update. It only refreshes when I zoom in or out, or press the home key.

Check out bits of the code in the link.

Hi

Sorry for the late reply.
Call the below metod in to update the graph automatically after feeding the new data to the dataSource (EnumerableDataSource Object)
dataSource.RaiseDataChanged();
Regards
Ravi
